subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Victor Estrella Burgos, who turns 34 on Saturday, will be the oldest player ever to make his debut in the main draw at the United States Open when it begins Aug. 25.
snippet: Victor Estrella Burgos, who turns 34 on Saturday, will be the oldest player ever to make his debut in the main draw at the United States Open when it begins Aug. 25.
